title: Screaming Kate Garraway lashes out at Ben Shephard after he 'cuts her hair off'
text:

Screaming Kate Garraway lashed out at a Ben Shephard today after he appeared to cut off her hair.

The Good Morning Britain presenter was fuming when her co-host got out a massive pair of scissors and seemingly snipped off some of her locks.

Mischievous Ben grabbed the back of her hair and went in with the scissors, then pulled away a big clump of hair.

"What? No don't. Seriously, Ben. Honestly," cried Kate, who believed he had genuinely cut off her locks.

Charlotte Hawkins could not believe what he had done, while Ben joked it wasn't as easy as he thought it would be.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Kate did not see the funny side and was convinced her hair had been ruined.

"That's not funny," exclaimed Kate. "You can't do that to someone. It's my hair."

Ben gave the piece of hair to comedian John Culshaw, who could sense the tense atmosphere in the studio.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Ben said: "I think it's alright. Oh crikey, it's going everywhere now."

Despairing Kate asked if she had a massive hole in the back of her hair.

Eventually, Ben admitted that it was all a prank and he had used some hair extensions rather than cutting Kate's actual hair.

(Image: ITV)

He confessed: "Before anyone gets particularly carried away, don’t worry it wasn’t real.

"It's not real Kate Garraway. I pulled a fast one."

Kate admitted Ben had almost ruined their 20-year friendship with his antics and she nearly passed out.

She said: "You nearly ruined a beautiful 20-year friendship. I was traumatised. I nearly feinted.

"You managed to get Brexit out of my mind. Maybe random haircuts are the solution."

(Image: ITV)

Good Morning Britain viewers took to Twitter after watching the hilarious moment.

One joker said: "Snipping point"

"These two should be on Thursdays as well," added another.

A third said: "Think she reactive very well most people would have smashed Ben shepherd"

*Good Morning Britain airs weekdays on ITV at 6am
description: Fuming Kate told Ben he had ruined their 20-year friendship before discovering it was just a prank
